column1: This year #SmallBusinessSaturday means so much more. Please safely support a small business today and help our communities heal from #COVID19. #ShopSmall https://t.co/v6nhaCxD96
🚨🚨 Another potential #COVID19 vaccine! Lots to be thankful for this week. https://t.co/dvOr0kmXft

Today is #NationalRuralHealthDay.   America's small towns deserve reliable access to high quality health care. As we continue to combat #COVID19 I am committed to bridging the divide between our urban and rural communities. https://t.co/2DItx0zgJ5
Americans are in need of common-sense #COVID19 relief. Congress must come together to get this done for our communities and small businesses. #LetsWork https://t.co/HTf1BXKZQh
Another important step in the effort to defeat #COVID19! https://t.co/6Son2e9JIG

🚨🚨 Thanks to @realDonaldTrump's quick action we are close to defeating #COVID19! Once approved by the @US_FDA this vaccine will be quickly distributed throughout our communities 💉 https://t.co/g2ZwPGBHqL
It is an honor to represent West Virginia. Together we will defeat COVID-19 rebuild our infrastructure and revitalize our great state!

The Republican #CommitmentToAmerica is to:  -Defeat #COVID19 -Rebuild the greatest economy -Keep the U.S. energy independent  -Protect our communities  Together we will restore rebuild and renew the American dream 🇺🇸
Happy Halloween 🎃  Please stay safe and maintain social distance in your celebrations!

Democrats have repeatedly held up crucial #COVID19 relief most recently blocking a $500 billion relief package in the Senate.   The American people need and deserve better than this. It is long past the time to deliver for our communities. https://t.co/Gqt6g6HCn9

I ended the week at Coronado Coal’s Eagle #1 Mine. They play an instrumental role in keeping West Virginians employed and supplying high-quality coal. I am committed to advocating for WV energy to help build and power the world. https://t.co/kYpsn1iBjd
My prayers are with @realDonaldTrump and @FLOTUS as they recover from #COVID19.   We are wishing for a swift and full recovery!

It is time to put American First and:   - Hold the CCP accountable for their role in the COVID-19 pandemic - Secure our supply chain & create US jobs - Bolster our national security - Keep US tech cutting edge - Improve economic competitiveness

Tonight I joined my colleagues in signing the discharge petition to force Speaker Pelosi to hold a vote on #PPP funding.   As we recover from #COVID19 our nation’s small businesses need our support to keep their doors open and employees paid.   It is long past the time to act. https://t.co/CXCPZN9iXR

It is disappointing that Washington Liberals continue to play politics instead of supporting America's hard-working small businesses.   While we rebuild our economy we must join together to help our communities recover from #COVIDー19. https://t.co/ymrWlxT8IO

This #SmallBusinessWeek I encourage you to buy local. America’s small businesses have been hit hard by the #Covid_19 pandemic so as we continue to open back up it is important we show these hardworking Americans our support! https://t.co/UuCTnWTytQ

It is National Truck Driver Appreciation Week!    Thank you to all truck drivers who are working around the clock to ensure important products are still being delivered around the country during #COVID19. You are the backbone of America & we are thankful for all you do! 🚛🚚

Under the direction of @realDonaldTrump  #OperationWarpSpeed is bringing together our public and private sectors to ensure we find a safe and effective #COVID-19 vaccine soon.   Learn more about this operation here: https://t.co/y5lTay56CA

I applaud @senatemajldr and my colleagues in the Senate for including a safe harbor provision to protect benefits for gig economy workers during the pandemic in their most recent COVID-19 relief package.

Happy #LaborDay!   Though we may spend Labor Day differently this year we must still celebrate our American workers and all they have done to improve our country.   I am committed to strengthening and supporting our great workforce in the wake of #COVID19. https://t.co/J4c3nM1n1j

The August Jobs Report is out and showing that unemployment is the lowest it has been since the outbreak of #COVID19 in March!  America is one step closer to healing from this virus! https://t.co/nVJyfFLTWp

Under the leadership of @realDonaldTrump America has  streamlined the vaccine making process. This is instrumental in ensuring we find a safe and effective #Covid_19 vaccine SOON.   Learn more here 👇 https://t.co/6POjkjWzMi
The #PPP protected 12 million jobs in rural communities! This is excellent news.   Together we are rebuilding our economy and recovering from #COVID19. https://t.co/dFX4AyjPwQ

If you have recovered from #COVID19 I highly recommend donating plasma to help another patient in need. We all have a role to play in combating this virus and this is a very important one!   More information here: https://t.co/ZriMNWrkbj https://t.co/nrGCZwodKH

Thank you to all the local leaders who attended my roundtable at @OnTheGorge. This Park attracts visitors from all over the world.   We are working together to alleviate the impact of COVID-19 and find more exciting opportunities to increase WV tourism! https://t.co/PEtaVwj1Vr

Thank you to all the doctors and nurses at Lincoln Primary Care Center for battling #COVID19 on the frontlines each day. It was great to see all the new telehealth machines bought with your nearly $1M COVID-Telehealth grant from the @FCC. https://t.co/iPmOsnj0oN

Under the leadership of @realDonaldTrump Operation Warp Speed is working to find safe and effective vaccines for #COVID19.   The public and private sectors are coming together to combat this virus and heal our nation and the world.   More here: https://t.co/kWCubXGVfw https://t.co/L19NL72AKA

As we continue to get out more and travel to our summer destinations please remember to wear a mask!   Wearing a mask will protect others around you and help prevent the spread of #COVID19.   We all have a role to play! https://t.co/aUtm2XBBJB

If you have recovered from #COVID19 please consider donating your plasma to help save the lives of your family friends and neighbors.   We all have a role to play in defeating this virus and this is a huge one!   Find more information here: https://t.co/ZriMNWIV2R https://t.co/D27W1dAl8y

In West Virginia alone overdoses have increased by 50% during the #COVID__19 pandemic. We must stop the illegal drug flow across our Southern Border.   That’s why I added an amendment to 2021 government funding to #BuildTheWall.   Sadly House Democrats voted this down.

🚨🚨 NEWS ➡️ Southern #WV airports just received $1.3 million for infrastructure projects.   Our airports play a crucial role in rebuilding our economy after #COVID19 and I am pleased to see this funding come home to our communities.   https://t.co/EZ47aCZmEl

#DYK the Paycheck Protection Program has supported over 50 million jobs during the #COVIDー19 pandemic?  And it has been extended to approve loans through August 8!   Help your small business by applying here: https://t.co/e24iP9PNXZ https://t.co/saisYU9uia

It was an honor to visit the Greenbrier County Health Department and meet these brave individuals who are battling #COVID19 on the frontlines. Thank you for all that you do to protect our community! https://t.co/MePmjUDHYC

I am at @FlyLWBWV to talk with aviation officials and local leaders about supporting our airports during #COVID19.   Together we can build up infrastructure and strengthen our economy to ensure the Greenbrier Valley has a future full of new opportunities! https://t.co/5umxEyn2NI

We must continue to keep West Virginia safe during #COVID__19 with increased testing and protective equipment for frontline responders.  I am proud to help secure this new funding for health centers and am committed to finding all available resources.  https://t.co/b9v119zUN9

🚨 Today is your last day to apply for a #PPP loan ‼️  This program has played an instrumental role in our economy's comeback from #COVID19. In #WV alone it has helped over 16000 businesses stay open.   Make sure to get your application in by midnight! https://t.co/EkToP1M60g

I am excited to announce that @ATT is donating $10000 to  @FacingHungerFB who will provide 75000 meals to families in Southern #WV! @ChamberAlerts and I are very grateful for all you and @WVNationalGuard are doing to help our communities recover from #COVID19. https://t.co/0xvsMDyK6i

Are you still waiting for your #Covid_19 Economic Impact Payment? The link below has information from the @IRSnews about how to track your payment if you need to take additional action and other details to ensure your check is delivered.   https://t.co/rN4cbhkrpx
🚨🚨 Free #Covid_19 testing will be available in Wyoming County next week on June 22 23 and 25.   More information can be found here:  https://t.co/ZjSVc9hQg0

As we recover from #COVID19 it’s crucial that all levels of government act together to rebuild our economy. These investments from the @US_EDA will help get West Virginians back to work and provide new opportunities for success. This is excellent news!   https://t.co/mnYy9Xj61s

Today I joined with local leaders to welcome two small businesses into the Logan community! Congratulations to Southern Charms Jewelry and Near Us Furniture on a successful opening. As we recover from #COVID19 it’s so uplifting to see new businesses open their doors. https://t.co/SG05ZU4OjU
As we continue to combat #Covid_19 we must ensure communities have the resources they need to survive this pandemic and keep Americans safely working.

Starting today farmers can apply for the Coronavirus Food Assistance Program. This loan is available to farmers who have suffered a 5% or greater price decline due to #COVID__19. More information is below: https://t.co/96eVmzBEgV

Today @RepCuellar and I introduced the Helping Gig Economy Workers Act of 2020 in the House. This bipartisan bill will ensure platform companies can continue to provide benefits like bonuses and paid leave to contractors during #COVIDー19 without the threat of lawsuits.

The Paycheck Protection Program has been instrumental in keeping food on the table for so many families across the United States.   These loans have helped over 15000 small businesses in WV keep employees on the payroll.  Together we are healing from #COVID__19! https://t.co/zxiYxvMax8

As West Virginia and all of America work to undo the effects of the pandemic and return to normalcy it is important that we reflect on what went right what went wrong and how we can improve.   Read my op-ed about our recovery from #Covid_19 here ⬇️  https://t.co/OxZLLEPVTH

Every day our doctors and nurses work hard on the front lines to help our loved ones stay healthy and combat #COVID19.   Thank you for all you do for us and our communities. We are eternally grateful. #NationalHospitalWeek https://t.co/AQokKGWDQt

As we celebrate National Transportation Week I would like to give a special thank you #ToThoseWhoKeepUsMoving. Without your hard work and dedication our nation would not have the resources it needs to combat #COVID19 and get our communities moving again. 🇺🇸🚛🚘

Thank you @IPRCenter for all you are doing to combat fraud throughout our supply chains. Your work ensures that the correct PPE is getting to our front line health care workers as they combat #Covid_19. https://t.co/vxf4YXqz5V

This #NationalDayofPrayer is more special this year. I was happy to join with the community of Cabell County to pray for our country.   If you have a spare moment I encourage you to pray for the health of our nation & those working on the frontlines to combat #Covid_19. https://t.co/i5galc36Uq

Thank you to all of our nation's nurses working each day to combat #COVIDー19. You are the heroes keeping our loved ones safe and healthy. For that we are eternally grateful.  #NationalNursesDay https://t.co/WFnLkxcpjU
Under @POTUS’ leadership the United States leads the world in COVID-19 testing BY FAR.   We are a safer country thanks to @realDonaldTrump! https://t.co/FYaqTwmJtV
🚨Excellent news! We are working around the clock to ensure more funding is coming home to keep our communities safe and healthy during #COVID19. https://t.co/EOo6BOnwun

The #PaycheckProtectionProgram will be available again this morning at 10:30 a.m.!   Small businesses can seek relief during #COVID19 by applying for this ~ forgivable ~ loan.  Find more information here: https://t.co/SBJvV1sj2a

Braskem America workers in PA and WV spent an entire month on the job without going home to produce the materials needed in 500 million N95 masks. Today @SteveScalise and I expressed our thanks to these heroes for helping our nation fight #Covid_19. We are forever grateful. 🇺🇸 https://t.co/rH5rTivIU0

📺Tonight I will be joining my colleagues @SenCapito @RepMcKinley @Sen_JoeManchin and @claymarsh on @WDTV5News to discuss West Virginia’s response to #Covid_19.   Tune in at 7pm here —> https://t.co/D28U0A6OrP

Tonight I voted for the Paycheck Protection Program and Health Care Enhancement Act to deliver much-needed small business relief keep Americans employed send resources to frontline providers and hospitals and expand COVID-19 testing.

I am glad Congress can finally replenish the #PaycheckProtectionProgram.   It was a shame Democrats played partisan politics for a week stalling this crucial bill. Now is the time to come together as Americans and combat #COVIDー19 together. https://t.co/Q0b2rxgAhK

All across the country truck drivers equipment operators flight crews maintenance workers emergency personnel and all other essential employees are working to help America fight #COVIDー19.    #ToThoseWhoKeepUsMoving we are with you we support you and we thank you. https://t.co/9JOR19mFAJ

The @WhiteHouse has released guidelines to #OpenUpAmericaAgain. I'm grateful that @POTUS provided a glimpse into what the future looks like. It's so important we do this in a smart & safe way in order to continue to protect our nation against #Covid_19.   https://t.co/kwf178Zc8C

FUNDING ALERT ‼️  West Virginia airports just received $9.3 million in relief funding for the #COVID19 pandemic. I am working to bring home as many resources as possible to help our communities during this crisis.   https://t.co/C90HqKrxA7

🚨NEWS: West Virginia health centers just received over $22 million to combat the #COVIDー19 pandemic. This funding is provided by the CARES Act and will significantly help diagnose treat and prevent the spread of Coronavirus in our communities.   https://t.co/DDkfZ5GgCt

Today is #WorldHealthDay.   Thank you to all of our doctors nurses and pharmacists working on the front lines to end the #COVID19 pandemic. You all play a crucial role in society and today we are especially grateful for everything that you do.

❗️Small Business Owners❗️  Applications are now being accepted for the Paycheck Protection Program.   These loans can help ensure your employees will continue getting paid during the #COVIDー19 pandemic.   Apply here: https://t.co/yGwCP7Z1WZ

We need innovative solutions to address #COVID19 in the US. That is why I held a call with @Battelle @WVHospitals @RepMcKinley & @RepAlexMooney to see how we can use their tech to decontaminate and reuse masks for WV healthcare workers save lives & reduce supply chain burdens.

If you are a small business that needs help paying employees during the COVID-19 crisis you’ll be able to apply for a Paycheck Protection Program loan starting this Friday (4/3).   Learn more here: https://t.co/HAIvzjD8as

Are you looking for more information about the individual checks the government will be sending out in response to the #Coronavirus? This article does a good job of explaining what to expect: https://t.co/oSVJQXJ6Q3
As we combat the spread of the Coronavirus it's crucial that we continue doing everything we can to help our nation respond to this crisis.

Speaker Pelosi is once again stalling important #COVID19 legislation by attempting to add requirements for all airlines to end carbon emissions by 2025 & funding sanctuary cities.  When will Democrats put politics aside and help the American people get through this crisis?

Today @realDonaldTrump announced guidelines to slow the spread of #coronavirus in 15 days. I encourage EVERYONE to follow this plan. We all must do our part. https://t.co/OrFFEuMvLe

For the most up to date information about how West Virginia is responding to the #CoronavirusOutbreak and the virus' status in our state the @WV_DHHR created one central page for all relevant information: https://t.co/4dCSmYJ1E7

Last night the House passed legislation to ensure a tax credit to employers paid leave programs for those affected increased access to telehealth services & free testing for #COVIDー19.  We are working diligently to keep America healthy.   This is bipartisanship at its best.

.@POTUS’s National Emergency Declaration unlocks the tremendous power of our government. This is a crucial step in combating #COVIDー19.   In addition opening up testing to all labs will increase the amount of tests that are available for all.   Thank you for your leadership.

We must all take the proper precautions to prevent further spread of the #CoronavirusPandemic. Below are ways to keep your home workplace school and commercial establishments safe ⤵️ https://t.co/64PCoWptut

I am working hard to make sure West Virginia is safe and prepared for the #Coronavirus but I need your help too. Here are some best practices we all should be doing to help lessen the impact of #COVID19 on our communities: https://t.co/GES9TLe2XU

Yesterday I voted for $7.8 billion in emergency funding for Coronavirus #COVID19 and I want to tell you where that money is going. I am committed to doing all I can to keep West Virginians and all Americans healthy. https://t.co/NlvwwWmJw3

Congress just passed crucial funding to help decrease the spread of #COVID19. We must keep Americans here & around the world safe. To prevent spreading it wash your hands often cover your mouth when coughing or sneezing stay home if you feel sick & avoid touching your face. https://t.co/RaIaH8LjES

I am closely monitoring #COVID19 and encrouage everyone to pay close attention in order to further prevent its spread. Follow @CDCgov and @CDCemergency for the most up-to-date information. https://t.co/b9h81fdaCi
